main event: A luminous object resembling a shooting star was observed falling to the west near Sandia Base, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object displayed red and green colors and appeared round in shape., The observation lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The observer was positioned on the ground at the entrance to Sentry House., The object was reported to be about the size of a marble., The object faded out during its descent.
sighted object: a luminous round object with red and green colors
witness description: CPT Robert G. P. Enright, Military Police officer
